Phrase.Text: Well, well, well... if it isn't [YourLeaderName]. I see you haven't tired of sticking your nose into quadrants that are none of your business. Retreat now.
Well, well, well... if it isn't [YourLeaderName]. I see you haven't tired of sticking your nose into quadrants that are none of your business. Retreat now or this may be your last time.

Well, well, well... if it isn't [YourLeaderName]. I see you haven't tired of sticking your nose into quadrants that are none of your business. Retreat now or this may be your last time. Death comes quickly at the hands of the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME]!
Arg, not YOU again, [YourLeaderName]. I've got to be honest, I've never really liked you..
Arg, not YOU again, [YourLeaderName]. I've got to be honest, I've never really liked you or the rest of the [YourEmpireName].
Arg, not YOU again, [YourLeaderName]. I've got to be honest, I've always hated you and the rest of the [YourEmpireName]. Get any closer to [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] territory and you'll pay the price!
Greetings [YourLeaderName], we are the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME]. We have already set a plan in motion to colonize certain worlds. It would be in your best interest to stay away from them.

Greetings, flesh creature. The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] have made claims to many of these worlds, and have plans for a few more. If we calculate that you are a threat to those plans, we will not hesitate to exterminate you.
Carbon-form, once this war is over, this galaxy will belong to the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME]. We have no love for organic life. Stay out of our way, or become space dust!
